text: The Devil's Wheel () is a 1926 Soviet silent movie, directed by Grigori Kozintsev and Leonid Trauberg.Мейерхольда по пяткамЛенин, Евтушенко и супергерои. Гид по мероприятиям «Библионочи-2017» It stars Pyotr Sobolevsky, Lyudmila Semyonova, and Sergei Gerasimov. ==Actors== *Pyotr Sobolevsky - Ivan Shorin, sailor from the cruiser "Aurora" *Lyudmila Semyonova - Valka, street girl *Sergei Gerasimov - leader of the gang of bandits *Emil Gal - entertainer Coco, friend of the "Question-mark" *Yanina Zhejmo - a girl from the gang == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1926 movies Category:1920s crime movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:Russian crime movies Category:Movies directed by Grigori Kozintsev Category:Movies directed by Leonid Trauberg
title: The Devil's Wheel
